title: Reluctant Father!
description: The father of her child... So what was Gifford Tait doing here in the Seychelles? Was he really arrogant enough just to walk back into Cassandra Morrow's life after ignoring her for' eighteen months? He soon made it clear that he still wanted Cass. But how could he sit there and not even mention his son? Well, Cass wasn't about to let him get away with it. She decided to wheel in the star of the show ... his baby.
author: Elizabeth Oldfield
